Posts.EditableText:
Since I can't script with the menu.
I'm going to have to use code.

Is there a way to see code for the scripts and learn it?

Problem so!bed by K.V,
Posts.HTML:
Since I can't script with the menu.
I'm going to have to use code.

Is there a way to see code for the scripts and learn it?

Problem so!bed by K.V,

Posts.EditableText:
Well, yes, yes, you can learn to code by looking at other code.

The best way to learn, I suggest, is to just try random code (or code blocks/clicker things) and see what works.

I like the code clicker button things the best.

Are you using the online version of Quest, or the computer/desktop Quest?

Some basic commands:
Print message.
Take.
Drop.
Move to inventory.
Look at.

-
There is also a tutorial. Just go to the create section. Then look for this message:

Need help? Ask at the forums.

For Quest games, try the step-by-step tutorial.

And click on the bottom link. And bam, there's the tutorial!
Posts.HTML:
Well, yes, yes, you can learn to code by looking at other code.

The best way to learn, I suggest, is to just try random code (or code blocks/clicker things) and see what works.

I like the code clicker button things the best.

Are you using the online version of Quest, or the computer/desktop Quest?

Some basic commands:
Print message.
Take.
Drop.
Move to inventory.
Look at.

There is also a tutorial. Just go to the create section. Then look for this message:

Need help? Ask at the forums.

For Quest games, try the step-by-step tutorial.

And click on the bottom link. And bam, there's the tutorial!

Is it an Android?

Posts.EditableText:
Okay, I may have figured something out...

---
This is what I get on my smaller tablet:

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/11256db2-1884-44dc-aba6-4b00367df994.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/11256db2-1884-44dc-aba6-4b00367df994.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/11256db2-1884-44dc-aba6-4b00367df994.png)

---
I click on Add new script, and I get this (just clicking the selection does nothing):

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/ac06f733-7244-4181-a9f9-98fa0168d661.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/ac06f733-7244-4181-a9f9-98fa0168d661.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/ac06f733-7244-4181-a9f9-98fa0168d661.png)

---
From there, I can't scroll down and I can't zoom out, but I *can* turn my device to get a vertical view of the page:

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/abdec1d9-d1ec-4e7c-a4c2-f82101fefb50.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/abdec1d9-d1ec-4e7c-a4c2-f82101fefb50.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/abdec1d9-d1ec-4e7c-a4c2-f82101fefb50.png)

---
Aha!
Now I can press that **OK** button I couldn't see before!

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3c8ba449-d259-46dd-930e-1638621e747e.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3c8ba449-d259-46dd-930e-1638621e747e.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3c8ba449-d259-46dd-930e-1638621e747e.png)

---
And now I can do stuff!!!

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3965edab-839b-4567-83f5-793e13ee1072.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3965edab-839b-4567-83f5-793e13ee1072.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/3965edab-839b-4567-83f5-793e13ee1072.png)

---
Or, you can click Code View to get to the bit where you enter scripts manually:

[![https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/e1155943-6d99-4e59-a443-49e4bd1d4c02.png](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/e1155943-6d99-4e59-a443-49e4bd1d4c02.png)](https://screenshots.firefoxusercontent.com/images/e1155943-6d99-4e59-a443-49e4bd1d4c02.png)
